name: places/ChIJOwskleRYwokRf1j6PMiYUac
formattedAddress: 140 E 55th St #4513, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 140 E 55th St #4513, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Alden are some of the finest shoes available on the market. Alden recommends B Nelson, exclusively, in New York City. Brought my shoes there for a small issue and it was addressed in no time, at no charge. Can’t recommend them enough.

text.text: Alden are some of the finest shoes available on the market. Alden recommends B Nelson, exclusively, in New York City. Brought my shoes there for a small issue and it was addressed in no time, at no charge. Can’t recommend them enough.

originalText.text: The best shoe shine in NYC! They are also the only authorized repair shop for Alden.

text.text: The best shoe shine in NYC! They are also the only authorized repair shop for Alden.

originalText.text:
Approximately 3 years ago I had my Alden bluchers recrafted with Dainite and was happy with the process. It’s no question B Nelson charges a premium for their craftsmanship so I went with them again to have the shoes recrafted. I also inquired about having the shanks replaced with an alternative TSA friendly shank. They assured me this would all be no problem.

This recraft with the work I requested cost me roughly $340 but I trusted with B Nelson it would be done right. This could not be further from my experience. I received the shoes back and my shoes that I had been wearing for years were now so tight they were painful to wear in any capacity. I phoned Nick as I figured this had to have been a fluke and gave him the opportunity to rectify the situation. He assured me it would be no issue that this is rare but it can happen and he could easily take care of the issue.

I sent the shoes back again and they have been returned to me and despite still not fitting, the last has been stretched so much trying to make them fit again they don’t even look anything like the perfectly good pair of shoes I sent them 3 months ago now. Not to mention the leather was visibly dried out and cracked from what seemed to be extreme stretching.

After all of this trouble and being left with a ruined pair of $600 Alden Straight tip bluchers and out $340 for the recraft that destroyed my shoes I very reasonably asked to be refunded for the work done. They won’t even answer my email regarding requesting a refund.

Save yourself the time, money, and inconvenience and utilize anyone else for these services. I purchased C&J Shell Bradford’s so next time around I can have TSA friendly shoes with Dainite that can be recrafted by the FACTORY.

originalText.text: This business is located inside VIP shoes. You will no see any street facing signage for it. The prices listed online are inaccurate.

text.text: This business is located inside VIP shoes. You will no see any street facing signage for it. The prices listed online are inaccurate.

originalText.text:
Great repair to my Birkenstock's by B. Nelson Shoes. I
spent $80 for a complete reconstruction in which
everything but the straps was replaced. I love seeing the character of the leather after three years. Will return with future repairs.
